page.title: 02Our Block - Description
page.content: Our block is basically{farmland}with some villages, hamlets and a corner of Perranporth.It also has large areas of dune and the corner of a military training area.Most of the farmland is given over to animal rearing and milk production but in the valley areas and more protected places you can find crops like wheat,corn and potatoes.There are a lot of{holiday {sites,}one in particular is the Perran Sands Holiday Village.There is a coastal path for walkers and a dismantled railway.The area is dotted with{disused tin mine workings}and some quarries.There is very little woodland and there is a famous historical site in the dunes called The Lost Church.Close by is the site of the second church which is innundated in sand.
